mapper.select:
select id, title , content , notice_status , deleted_at , created_at , updated_at , count(1) over() total_count from notices where 1 = 1 and deleted_at is null
and title like '%'|| #{searchStr} ||'%'
and created_at between to_date(#{startDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date(#{endDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1
order by notice_status desc, updated_at desc
limit #{length} offset #{beginNo}
select id, title , content , notice_status , deleted_at , to_char(created_at , 'YYYY-MM-DD') as created_at , to_char(updated_at , 'YYYY-MM-DD') as updated_at from notices where 1 = 1 and id = #{id}
mapper.insert:
insert into notices ( title, content, notice_status, created_at) values ( #{title}, #{content}, #{noticeStatus}, now() )
select currval('notices_id_seq')
